sofia.name: Stylish Backpack
sofia.about: A versatile backpack made of durable material, perfect for school or travel. Comes with multiple compartments and a comfortable strap.

yana.name: Wireless Earbuds
yana.about: Enjoy clear sound and long battery life with these wireless earbuds. Perfect for workouts and daily commutes.

maksim.name: Smart Watch
maksim.about: Track your fitness and notifications with this sleek smartwatch. Compatible with iOS and Android devices.

yrik.name: Gaming Mouse
yrik.about: High-precision mouse with customizable buttons. Ideal for gamers who need speed and comfort.

dasha.name: LED Desk Lamp
dasha.about: Brighten your workspace with this adjustable LED lamp. Comes with multiple brightness levels and color modes.

nikita.name: Bluetooth Speaker
nikita.about: Take your music anywhere with this portable speaker. Offers powerful sound and long battery life.

illaM.name: Yoga Mat
illaM.about: Comfortable and non-slip yoga mat made from eco-friendly materials. Perfect for yoga and home workouts.

illaD.name: Coffee Mug
illaD.about: A sturdy ceramic mug with a stylish design. Perfect for coffee, tea, or hot chocolate.
